verse: यस्यैकनिःश्वसितकालमथावलम्ब्य जीवन्ति लोमविलजा जगदण्डनाथाः । विष्णुर्महान्स इह यस्य कलाविशेषो गोविन्दमादिपुरुषं तमहं भजामि ॥
overall_meaning: I worship Him, whose single breath sustains until the end of time, whose hair follicles are the protectors of the world, who is Vishnu, the great swan, whose special aspect here is Govinda, the original person.
